results.alt: Picture of a mother otter and her cubs in the Shetland Islands
results.title: Eurasian Otters, Shetland Islands
results.description: In the Shetland Islands a mother and two male cubs listen intently to the clicking of the photographer’s camera. The nose of the cub at right had a recent encounter with a crab. Adults don’t live as pairs, and males play no part in raising the young.

results.alt: Picture of a pair of penguin chicks in Antarctica
results.title: Gentoo Penguin Chicks, Antarctica
results.description: In Port Lockroy, Antarctica, two newly hatched gentoo penguin chicks get a quick look at the outside world as one of their parents stands up on the nest for a moment.

results.alt: Picture of cobalt-winged parakeets in Yasuni National Park, Ecuador
results.title: Parakeets, Ecuador
results.description: In Ecuador</a's Yasuní National Park, cobalt-winged parakeets flock to a pool. Scientists have identified nearly 600 species of birds in the park.

results.alt: Picture of tadpoles swimming in a swamp in British Columbia
results.title: Tadpoles, Canada
results.description: Tadpoles swim through a jungle of lily stalks in Cedar Lake on Vancouver Island Canada

results.alt: Picture of a cheetah and a leopard facing off in Botswana
results.title: Cheetah and Leopard, Botswana
results.description: A very rare, adrenaline-packed showdown between two spotted predators: a male cheetah and a female  leopard

results.alt: Picture of a diving bird chasing baitfish on the Santa Maria reef, Mexico
results.title: Diving Bird, Mexico
results.description: While taking photos of Santa Maria reef near Cabo San Lucas, Mexico, I noticed this deep-diving bird chasing a massive school of baitfish in the middle of the reef. It was fast, but I was able to get this shot from above.

results.alt: Picture of a lion sleeping in the grass in South Africa
results.title: Sleeping Lion, South Africa
results.description: This male lion rests in the soft grass on a gloomy day in  South Africa

results.alt: Picture of stingrays swimming in the waters of Grand Cayman
results.title: Stingrays, Grand Cayman
results.description: Stingrays gracefully flying, forming a perfect straight line. Sand bar, Grand Cayman.

results.alt: Picture of a baby loggerhead sea turtle in the waters off Florida
results.title: Loggerhead Sea Turtle, Florida
results.description: A loggerhead sea turtle that never made it to sea with its brothers and sisters is released into the waters off Palm Beach by a researcher.

results.alt: Picture of a bear in a forest in Finland
results.title: Bear, Finland
results.description: This was the only bear that turned up that night. I spent 16 hours in the hide, and at about midnight, he turned up. He made one appearance and then disappeared. I just loved seeing the bear in its beautiful habitat. Image taken in Finland
